original_text:
Who rises up for me against the wicked?
    Who stands up for me against evildoers?
korean_text: 누가 나를 위하여 일어나서 행악자들을 치며 누가 나를 위하여 일어나서 악행하는 자들을 칠까

sentences.original_text: Who rises up for me against the wicked?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 나를 위해 악인들에게 맞서 일어서는가?

sentences.original_text: Who stands up for me against evildoers?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 나를 위해 행악자들에게 맞서 서는가?
